#include<stdio.h>

int main()
{
long long a[89];
//long long b[89];
char b[27];
int i;
a[1]=a[2]=1;
for(i=3;i<89;i++)
{a[i]=a[i-1]+a[i-2];
//if(a[i]%26==0)
//printf("%d\n",a[i]);
}
//printf("%lld",a[88]);
for(i=1;i<27;i++)
b[i]='A'+i-1;
int t;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{int n;
scanf("%d",&n);
int j;
for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
{if(a[j]%26==0)
a[j]=26;
else
a[j]=a[j]%26;
printf("%c",b[a[j]]);
}
printf("\n");
}
return 0;
}
